City Council
============

Meetings
--------

* 6 pm
* Twice per month, on the second and fourth Tuesday
* City Hall  
  2221 N Phillips Ranch Road  
  Granite Shoals, TX 78654

### Meetings are open to the public unless otherwise specified and are held in the Council Chambers at City Hall. Individuals wishing to address the Council during a meeting are encouraged to complete a [Public Comment Card](https://www.graniteshoals.org/DocumentCenter/View/827) and submit it to the City Secretary prior to the commencement of the meeting.

### If you are interested in future elections or running for City Council, please visit the [Elections page](https://www.graniteshoals.org/187/Elections).

[View Most Recent Agendas and Minutes](https://www.graniteshoals.org/129/Agendas-Minutes)
